document.full_text: the president of toyota motors  said on saturday he expects the automaker to resume full production globally in november and its japanese output is expected this month to recover to 90 percent of levels seen before a march earthquake.
document.title: toyota president sees return to full output from november
lines_and_colors: the president of toyota motors  said on saturday he expects the automaker to resume full production globally in november and its japanese output is expected this month to recover to 90 percent of levels seen before a march earthquake.
